Hydraling is now your active pet.
Rufus is now enemy active pet.
Round 1
[Scratch] dealt 317 damage to your Hydraling.
[Call Lightning] dealt 1042 damage to enemy Rufus (Strong).
[Call Lightning] applied [Beast] to enemy Rufus.
[Call Lightning] changed the weather to [Lightning Storm].
Round 2
[Scratch] dealt 396 damage to your Hydraling.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Hydraling.
[Tail Slap] dealt 248 damage to enemy Rufus.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 57 damage to enemy Rufus (Strong).
Round 3
[Scratch] dealt 396 damage to your Hydraling.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Hydraling.
[Tail Slap] dealt 238 damage to enemy Rufus.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 57 damage to enemy Rufus (Strong).
Enemy Rufus died.
Round 3
Takey-Take is now enemy active pet.
Round 4
[Flamethrower] dealt 237 damage to your Hydraling.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Hydraling.
[Flamethrower] applied [Flamethrower] to your team.
[Whirlpool] applied [Whirlpool] to enemy team.
[Flamethrower] dealt 39 damage to your Hydraling.
Your Hydraling died.
Round 4
Fen Crab is now your active pet.
Round 5
[Flurry] dealt 158 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Flurry] dealt 158 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 57 damage to your Fen Crab (Critical).
[Flurry] dealt 158 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Claw] dealt 643 damage to enemy Takey-Take (Strong).
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to enemy Takey-Take.
[Flamethrower] dealt 39 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Fen Crab.
Round 6
[Scratch] dealt 317 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Claw] dealt 494 damage to enemy Takey-Take (Strong).
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to enemy Takey-Take.
[Flamethrower] dealt 39 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Lightning Storm] dealt 38 damage to your Fen Crab.
[Whirlpool] dealt 463 damage to enemy Takey-Take.
Enemy Takey-Take died.
[Flamethrower] fades from your team.
[Whirlpool] fades from enemy team.
[Lightning Storm] is no longer the weather.
Round 6
Bubs is now enemy active pet.
Round 7
[Chomp] dealt 415 damage to your Fen Crab.
Your Fen Crab died.
Round 7
Snarly is now your active pet.
Round 8
[Chomp] dealt 627 damage to your Snarly (Critical).
[Rip] dealt 243 damage to enemy Bubs (Strong).
[Rip] applied [Bleeding] to enemy Bubs.
[Bleeding] dealt 152 damage to enemy Bubs (Strong).
Round 9
[Consume] dealt 117 damage to your Snarly (Weak).
[Consume] healed 117 damage from enemy Bubs.
[Blood in the Water] dealt 650 damage to enemy Bubs.
[Bleeding] dealt 152 damage to enemy Bubs (Strong).
Round 10
[Acidic Goo] applied [Acidic Goo] to your Snarly.
[Rip] dealt 243 damage to enemy Bubs (Strong).
[Bleeding] dealt 152 damage to enemy Bubs (Strong).
[Acidic Goo] dealt 46 damage to your Snarly.
Round 11
[Surge] dealt 243 damage to enemy Bubs.
Enemy Bubs died.
[Acidic Goo] dealt 46 damage to your Snarly.
[Battle Recovery] healed 418 damage from your Snarly.
